## Description

**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of what the problem is (e.g., I'm always frustrated when...).

**Describe the proposed solution**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. Include the "User Story" format: *As a [user], I want
to [action] so that [value/benefit].*

## Definition of Done (Checklist)

- [ ] Feature logic implemented according to requirements.
- [ ] Unit and Integration tests passed.
- [ ] UI/UX alignment (if applicable).
- [ ] Public API or documentation updated.

## Technical Details

- **Impacts:** (e.g., New database tables, changes to existing endpoints, performance overhead)
- **Dependencies:** (e.g., Third-party libraries, environment variables, or other pending features)

## Implementation Notes

- Proposed architecture or design patterns.
- Reference links to similar features or UI mockups.
- Potential edge cases to consider.
